channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Job DSL Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Job DSL Plugin

item.title: CVE-2019-1003034|2024-08-05T03:07:16.812Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20job%20dsl%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability exists in Jenkins Job DSL Plugin 1.71 and earlier in job-dsl-core/src/main/groovy/javaposse/jobdsl/dsl/AbstractDslScriptLoader.groovy, job-dsl-plugin/build.gradle, job-dsl-plugin/src/main/groovy/javaposse/jobdsl/plugin/JobDslWhitelist.groovy, job-dsl-plugin/src/main/groovy/javaposse/jobdsl/plugin/SandboxDslScriptLoader.groovy that allows attackers with control over Job DSL definitions to execute arbitrary code on the Jenkins master JVM.
